error.nomadbooks.no_space: Not enough space to set up the camp
error.nomadbooks.invalid_surface: The surface isn't wide enough to set up the camp
error.nomadbooks.different_dimension: The camp is in another dimension and cannot be retrieved
error.nomadbooks.camp_too_far: The camp is too far and cannot be retrieved
info.nomadbooks.itinerant_ink_done: You have travelled enough for the itinerant ink to write a new page! Your nomad book now has a width of %s.
info.nomadbooks.notify_blacklist: Player must manually remove blacklisted blocks from camp: %s
nomadbooks.yacl.title: Nomad Books Redux
nomadbooks.yacl.start_with_book.desc: Every player is given a nomad book the first time they join each world
nomadbooks.yacl.default_book_height.desc: The default starting height for standard nomad books
nomadbooks.yacl.default_book_width.desc: The default starting width for standard nomad books. Must be odd (1,3,5,7,...)
nomadbooks.yacl.checks_above_on_deploy: Number of Fungi Checks Above on Deployment
nomadbooks.yacl.checks_above_on_deploy.d: checks to deploy with Fungi Support at additional +Y positions
nomadbooks.yacl.air_replaceable.desc: Additional blocks to add to the Air Replaceable list (comma separated Item IDs)
nomadbooks.yacl.not_spacial_displaceable: Blocks that should never be displaced as Terrain (comma separated Item IDs)
nomadbooks.yacl.camp_blocks_blacklist.de: Blacklist of block_ids that the camp won't pick up
